channel.title: CVE Feed for NicheAddons -- Restaurant & Cafe Addon for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NicheAddons -- Restaurant & Cafe Addon for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-44032|2024-10-07T13:08:57.264Z -- nicheaddons -- restaurant%20%26%20cafe%20addon%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in NicheAddons Restaurant & Cafe Addon for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant & Cafe Addon for Elementor: from n/a through 1.5.5.
